title: The Muncher  for ZX Spectrum 128
creator_credit: Rob Howard, Beam Software, Gremlin Graphics Software and Zero Wait
material_description: Cassette tape computer game. Cassette, cover, badge and manual in a plastic cassette case.
brief_description: The Muncher [computer game]. The Muncher is a single player side scrolling action game. Players control a rampaging monster destroying buildings by climbing on them, breathing fire and jumping on people and cars while attempting to avoid getting shot at by people with guns. The game ends when the monster’s health has been depleted by being attacked.
